questions.label: Goals and intent
questions.text: Why are you exploring opportunities on Frantiger right now
questions.name: goal_primary
options: I want to invest capital and earn returns
I want to own and actively run a business
I want semi passive income that grows over time
I want to explore sectors before bigger bets
I am a consultant or broker looking for deals
questions.helper: You can refine this later in your investor profile.

questions.label: Time horizon
questions.text: How long are you willing to stay invested before expecting strong returns
questions.name: time_horizon
questions.helper: This helps us avoid models that naturally take longer than you prefer.

questions.label: Ticket size
questions.text: What total amount are you comfortable deploying per opportunity
questions.name: ticket_size
questions.helper: This is a comfort range, not a binding commitment.

questions.label: Risk appetite
questions.text: When it comes to business risk, where do you naturally sit
questions.name: risk_tolerance
questions.helper: This helps us avoid deals that feel too wild or too boring for you.

questions.label: Behavior
questions.text: If your business reports a bad quarter, what are you most likely to do first
questions.name: reaction_style
options: Call the operator or founder to understand
Plan to exit and protect capital
Look at the long term and stay the course

questions.label: Decision style
questions.text: How would you describe your decision making style for investments
questions.name: decision_style
options: Very quick, I go with my gut
Fairly quick, once key data is clear
I take my time, I like deep research
I move very slowly and cautiously

questions.label: Involvement
questions.text: How hands on do you want to be in your ideal opportunity
questions.name: involvement_level
options: Capital partner - I write the cheque, someone else runs the show
Co pilot - I support and guide, a manager or founder runs it
Operator - I want to be in the driver seat daily
questions.helper: This strongly affects what kind of listings we show you first.

questions.label: Time available
questions.text: How much time can you realistically give per week
questions.name: time_per_week

questions.label: People you like working with
questions.text: Who do you prefer to work with the most
questions.name: partner_preference
options: A strong brand that already has systems in place

questions.label: Sectors
questions.text: Which sectors are you genuinely excited about right now
questions.name: sectors
options: I am open if economics are strong
questions.helper: You can pick more than one. We will not force you into sectors you are not excited about.

questions.label: Customer types
questions.text: Which type of customers do you feel most comfortable dealing with
questions.name: customer_segment
options: B2C - consumers, families, walk in users

questions.label: Brand vs upside
questions.text: If you had to choose, what would you prefer
questions.name: brand_preference
options: A well known brand that grows steadily
A lesser known brand with higher upside potential
Depends on the numbers, not the name

questions.label: Geography
questions.text: Where are you most interested in investing or operating
questions.name: geo_scope

questions.label: Deal structures
questions.text: What kind of deal structures appeal to you the most
questions.name: deal_structures
options: Single franchise I own and run
Multiple franchises I own with managers
I am open to all, show me what is good

questions.label: Non negotiables
questions.text: What is absolutely non negotiable for you in any opportunity
questions.name: non_negotiables
options: Scalable model, not one location only
Skin in the game from founder or brand

questions.label: Experience
questions.text: What best describes your experience so far
questions.name: experience_level
options: I have run a small or mid size business
I have invested in or backed businesses before
I am a seasoned founder, investor or operator

questions.label: Lessons
questions.text: What is one lesson you never want to forget from past business or investment experience
questions.name: key_lesson
questions.placeholder: Example: Never enter a business where I do not trust the numbers or the people.
questions.helper: This helps us understand your values and red flags more deeply.

questions.label: What comes first
questions.text: If you had to choose, what comes first for you
questions.name: priority_focus
questions.helper: This helps us prioritize which signals to highlight first when you look at a deal.
